title: The red comet archive complete! 1940 Fiction House
description:
Red Comet worked as the "mystery man of the universe" in the year 2040. He fought criminals using his magical abilities.

His powers include telekinesis, super-strength, extrasensory crime detection, the ability to shrink to the size of an insect or grow to over 5 miles tall (using an intra-atomic space adjuster), and the ability to make things explode with his mind. He flew a ship that could travel over 660 million miles per hour.

His enemies included Golo, J.G., a Jovian giant, the Stickers, the Tyrant of Mysto and his monster, the Uranians, Tony Scaro, Kil, King Sinto of Jupiter, Bruto, Saturnian Giants, Zorix, Queen Lura, the King of Uranus, the Miges, Mars, John Freeman the Dictator of Axia,the Fire Men, Rasnel, Randi, Prince Orman, Murton, the Slasher, King Tyrus, Zagu and the Spidermen.

Golden Age Appearances  
Planet Comics #1, #3-20, #37, #69

seed for all to enjoy
